title: #187: Manning the Front Lines of the Information War | Rob Dew
description:
Infowars Producer Rob Dew stops by to give us the year-end wrap-up on what we have been experiencing over the past 12 months, what the Globalists have planned for 2022, and what we can do to thwart their plans.

Is the SPARS Pandemic document that Rob, Alex Jones, and Michael Halpern reported on the playbook for what is coming next, or is it nothing more than an ambitious plan for depopulation?

The next year will be one of the most important in our lives as decisions are being made without our consent by politicians with dubious connections and psychopathic aspirations, and Rob Dew has a front-row seat for all of it. Do we have a chance to turn things around, or are we simply repositioning the lounge chairs on the Titanic?
